S

saveGame(File) - Method in class application.Game
saveGame takes the results of the game and writes them into a file for loading later on.
setLabel(String) - Method in class application.MainSceneController
setLabel() responsible for setting value of label.
Ship - Class in application
Ship class detailing ship parameters to aid with grid display
Ship(String, Integer, Boolean, Integer) - Constructor for class application.Ship
Ship constructor for Ship class, allows creation of a new ship if you have all the info at hand.
Ship(String, Integer) - Constructor for class application.Ship
Ship constructor for Ship class, allows creation of a ship without knowing it's position and orientation yet.
start(Stage) - Method in class application.Main
start program entry, opens the stage and sets the scene.
stop() - Method in class application.Main
stop stops the game.
